title.rendered: Uttar Pradesh vs Maharashtra, Indian Domestic Cup 2022: Today’s Match Prediction, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
Time: March 3, 9:30 AM IST

Venue: Gurgaon Cricket Ground (SRNCC), Sultanpur, Gurgaon

Pitch Report

There are two scores above 500 runs in the two games hosted at the venue this season. The spinners have gotten more purchase than the pacers.

Teams

Probable XI for Uttar Pradesh: Madhav Kaushik, Samarth Singh, Priyam Garg, Karan Sharma (c), Akshdeep Nath, Rinku Singh, Dhruv Jurel (wk), Shivam Sharma, Yash Dayal, Ankit Rajpoot, Aaqib Khan

Probable XI for Maharashtra: Pavan Shah, Yash Nahar, Rahul Tripathi, Ankit Bawne (c), Azim Kazi, Vishant More (wk), Satyajeet Bachhav, Mukesh Choudhary, Naushad Shaikh, Vicky Ostwal, Pradeep Dadhe

Fantasy Tips

We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Players to Watch Out for

Pavan Shah, in his debut First-Class game, scored a spectacular double-hundred against Assam and later complimented it with scores of 33 and 26 against Vidarbha. He has collected the most fantasy points in the league.

Satyajeet Bachhav has been phenomenal with both bat and ball: he has taken 13 wickets at an outstanding average of 15.6 and has scores of 52* and 36.

For Uttar Pradesh, Saurabh Kumar boasted of his all-round skills: he has the highest score of 81* and a three-wicket haul to his name.

Ankit Rajput has taken the bulk of the wickets for Uttar Pradesh. His 8 wickets have come at an impressive average of 27.

Rinku Singh, Samarth Singh, and Dhruv Jurel have scored two half-centuries each.

It was Naushad Shaikh’s hundred against Vidarbha that saved the game for Maharashtra. He also rolled his arm for a few overs but ended up wicketless.

Ankit Bawne missed out on a three-figure mark by a mere 8 runs. He anyway has been in good touch this season, scoring a match-winning hundred in List A cricket in a successful run-chase.

Priyam Garg has got starts but failed to convert them into a big innings. The half-century against Vidarbha was laced with 10 boundaries.

Rahul Tripathi went on a king pair against Vidarbha, and before that, he had a score of 2 against Assam. The talented batter is yet to find to his feet.

How excited are you for today’s match? Play fantasy cricket on the My11Circle today
